adverbs.description: mournfully (comparative more mournfully, superlative most mournfully)

entries.meaning: In a mournful manner; as if in mourning for something.
examples: "Why have not we an immortal soul?" asked the little mermaid mournfully; "I would give gladly all the hundreds of years that I have to live, to be a human being only for one day, and to have the hope of knowing the happiness of that glorious world above the stars."
